Action.label: Create the file "Instructions.txt" to "HA Chaining Voice Commands/Instructions.txt".
Action.Str:
Home Automation Voice Commands, by Javier Refuerzo, Denver, CO. USA. June 31, 2015
****PLEASE VISIT THE FOLLOWING LINK FOR COMPLETE INSTRUCTIONS******
https://plus.google.com/+JavierRefuerzo/posts/Y2ANQYXS3bU
CONTACT plus.google.com/+JavierRefuerzo Facebook.com/javier.refuerzo.1 swanseaventuresllc@gmail.com
Copyright 2015 Javier Refuerzo
This file is part of "Home Automation Voice Commands". "Home Automation Voice Commands" is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. "Home Automation Voice Commands" is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with "Home Automation Voice Commands". If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
*********Instructions**********
This is an early version of this project, please help by reporting bugs and or contributing fixes. Please contact me via google plus, in the autoapps forum under this project, or in the Universal Devices Forum under this project.
Visit the following link for updated instructions.
https://plus.google.com/+JavierRefuerzo/posts/Y2ANQYXS3bU
******WHATS NEW******* 1.0.1.2 Added AutoWear Setup Autowear is no longer AutoVoice Dependent
1.0.1.1 Added Domoticz Groups and Scenes 1.0.1.0 Fixed Linking Tasker Tasks Fixed Bug when Adding/Removing Correction Word(s) IF YOU TRIED THE FOLLOWING ITEMS FOR CONTROLERS OTHER THEN THE ISY YOU HAVE CORRUPTED FILES! PLEASE DELETE THE FOLDER "HA Chaining Voice Commands" from your internal storage and re link devices. Fixed remove location dependency as ISY was the only controller working with this setting. Fixed Remove Linked Devices as ISY was the only controller working with this setting.
1.0.0.9 UI Improvements Fixed Notification enable/disable Added ablility to add multiple access points for notifications (i.e two channel router with different wifi ssid names)
1.0.0.7 Fixed multi-word default room/location. ADDED VERA SWITCHES! (Thanks +Jerry Wolford) Fixed Domoticz/ISY Action Association not saving. UI and instructions improvements.
1.0.0.6 UI Enhancements
1.0.0.5 Added Domoticz Devices, Scenes coming soon. Tester Needed!
1.0.0.4 Tasker Integration, via intents. A tasker Project XML can be created with the app, then imported into tasker for two way communication, see tasker instructions for more info. Also added task to import custom tasker projects if you were using this project in tasker.
UI and instructions changes
1.0.0.3 Added ability to change App Notification TEXT (Used in non- AutoVoice get voice Prompt and lock screen notificaton)
Added Lock Screen Notification for quicker access to non-AutoVoice Voice commands, this can be enabled to shoe only on home network or disabled.
UI Changes
1.0.0.2 Name of project changed from "Home Automation - Chaining Voice Commands" to "Home Automation Voice Commands" because of the 30 character name limit in google play.
Version number system changed from "V4.1.1" to "1.0.0.2" this was to make tasker project and android app have similar verson numbers
Added GNU General Public License in preperation of App release.
Added Local (Non- AutoVoice) get voice option which allows the app icon to start voice recognition.
V4.1.0 Added the INSTEON HUB to availible devices. Fixed "Remove Location Dependency".
*******Get Tasker Project Source XML*******
https://github.com/JavierRefuerzo/Home_Automation_Voice_Commands
******Special Thanks*******
Thanks to the Creator(s) of "tasker" the software use to create some of this project
Thanks to Joao Diaz (AutoApps, AutoVoice) for his tasker plugins and hosting this project.
Thanks to +DavidSvorcBigman (Google+) for creating the material tasker scene templates.
Thanks to Jimbo (Universal Devices Forum) for testing and suggestions.
Thanks to +Daniel Söderlund (Varazir) (Google+) for testing this project with Domoticz.
Thanks to +Jerry Wolford (Google+) for testing this project with Vera.
App Icon purchased from sutterstock.com
plus.google.com/+JavierRefuerzo Facebook.com/javier.refuerzo.1 swanseaventuresllc@gmail.com
INSTRUCTIONS https://plus.google.com/+JavierRefuerzo/posts/Y2ANQYXS3bU
Copyright 2015 Javier Refuerzo

Action.Str: You must use the Local (Non- AutoVoice) get voice option which allows the app icon to start voice recognition. To change settings click the menu (hamburger icon) then select "LAUNCH VOICE BY TAP" and change the variable to "Yes" (case sensitive). Once this is done touching the app icon will start voice recognition, you must say "SETTINGS" to get to the settings screen again

Action.Str:
TASKER INSTRUCTIONS
****SKIP THIS STEP IF YOU HAVE NEVER USED THE TASKER PROJECT RELATED TO THIS APP***** STEP 1 (Only use if importing from the tasker project to the app) Go to Settings(Hamburger icon)>Tasker_Settings>Migrat_From_Tasker_Project_To_App. This will update all the custom task names (created by you) to items usable by the app. This must be done first as once the file is created by the app you can no longer import these tasks and they must be deleted manually.
STEP 2 Make sure tasker is installed on device and in Menu_>Preferences Select the UI tab, Make sure "Beginner Mode" is NOT checked.
STEP 3 NOTES (STEP 3 BELOW) NOTES: This app communicates with tasker with intents, for that reason you will need to import a project into tasker which can send and receive intents. This was done for many reasons such as Intents to tasker were not working for all versions of android (at least not in the same way), The user is able to see what imformation is set to and from tasker, and Possible future plugin interface (for user created plugins) END NOTES.
STEP 3 Then in HOME AUTOMATION VOICE COMMANDS go to Settings(Hamburger icon)>Tasker_Settings> and click "CREATE TASKER XML", this will create a tasker project in the folder Tasker/projects/Get_Send_For_Home_Automation_Voice_Commands.prj.xml.
STEP 4 Go into tasker and long click on a project (or the house icon on the bottom left), Select "Import", Select the "Get_Send_For_Home_Automation_Voice_Commands" project. This project can be renamed if you wish once it is imported.
STEP 5 In the HOME AUTOMATION VOICE COMMANDS PROJECT go to Settings(Hamburger icon)>Tasker_Settings and select "REFRESH TASKER TASKS", this will provide the app with all tasks so they can be used in the app. Please remember that you must REFRESH TASKER TASKS whenever you create a new task in tasker and wish to use it with this program.
STEP 6 Say your voice commands and choose "Tasker Task" from the prompt!

Action.Str: It is the BEST practice to link devices by location-device. With location-device linking you can say commands such as "turn off the living room and dining room lights". However if you would like to remove the location dependency long click on the device below. If LOCATION is removed, it can NOT be added again through the normal linking process. The DEVICE will now be the only trigger. The DEVICE must be removed from COMMAND ASSOCIATION to add location dependency to device type.

set the action i.e. on,off,dim
find the index of the name so we can lookup the address

DO NOT CHANGE THIS UNLESS (1) YOUR LANGUAGE IS NOT ENGLISH OR (2) YOU KNOW WHAT THESE ACTION CODES REPRESENT WITH INSTEON HUB HTTP GET ACTIONS. Enter spoken action (i.e. "on") to INSTEON HUB HTTP Device Action (i.e. "11FF") in the following format "on= 11FF,off=1300"

ENTER A ROOM OR LOCATION. Examples: "living room", "kitchen", "porch", "dining room".
